# rio-stac

Create STAC Items from raster datasets.

---**Documentation**: https://developmentseed.github.io/rio-stac/**Source Code**: https://github.com/developmentseed/rio-stac---`rio-stac` is a simple [rasterio](https://github.com/mapbox/rasterio) plugin for creating valid STAC items from a raster dataset. The library is built on top of [pystac](https://github.com/stac-utils/pystac) to make sure we follow the STAC specification.## Installation```bash$ pip install pip -U# From Pypi$ pip install rio-stac#
